document.full_text: china needs to identify and provide effective aids drugs to more hiv patients infected through sexual contact and use of dirty needles if it wants cut hiv death rates and avoid broader transmission of the virus, researchers said on thursday.
document.title: wider distribution of drugs needed to cut aids deaths in china
lines_and_colors: china needs to identify and provide effective aids drugs to more hiv patients infected through sexual contact and use of dirty needles if it wants cut hiv death rates and avoid broader transmission of the virus, researchers said on thursday.
